results.content: Very well explained course and a very rare course which has end to end implementation for a Computer vision problem. Only issue is keras and tensorflow are bit complicated to use with gpu as the libraries get updated fast and give frequent errors - but then it cant be covered in any course.

response.content:
Thank you so much Shenoy for the kind feedback. I am glad you found the course helpful. And I agree that tensorflow and keras libraties update so frequently giving so many warnings and depreciation messages. But again, that give us an opportunity to update our course making it more efficient and up to date. 
I may add a new lecture in near future, revamping the entire code using the new tensorflow. 
Good luck and have a good day !!
response.content_html:
Thank you so much Shenoy for the kind feedback. I am glad you found the course helpful. And I agree that tensorflow and keras libraties update so frequently giving so many warnings and depreciation messages. But again, that give us an opportunity to update our course making it more efficient and up to date.
I may add a new lecture in near future, revamping the entire code using the new tensorflow.
Good luck and have a good day !!

results.content: There are lots of courses  available on model building but no one is addressing how to utilize the model in production environment. This is end to end solution from model building to deployment. Great course and very practical.  It will be helpful in enhancing the skills beyond the ML and DL. Best of luck.

response.content: Thanks Zamir. I am glad you found the content useful and relevant.
response.content_html: Thanks Zamir. I am glad you found the content useful and relevant.
